verbose_text: Similarly, in C. neoformans, virulence factor production is regulated by the cAMP-PKA cascade and both Pde1 and Pde2, which are negatively regulated by Pka1 and Pka2 (catalytic subunits of PKA), are specifically required during melanin and capsule production under stress, e.g., low iron conditions.
evidence: Pde2, which are negatively regulated by Pka1 and Pka2
